title: Secrets, Tea and Ginger: or, her ladyship's primer on figging and fisting
description: All six stories from the spicy series Secrets, Tea and Ginger all tied up in one volume for the very first time. This blistering collection also includes an exclusive epilogue. When Lady Celia suspects her husband of cheating on her she embarks on a complicated and devilishly spicy revenge. But when things don't go as planned she finds herself falling into both the arms of her footman and a dangerous web spun by her beautiful, scheming maid. Soon Celia is doing things no proper lady would ever do, and having the most deliciously nasty things done to her. From ginger roots to steam-powered medical devices and extreme public insertions, there seems to be no bottom to the depravity in which Celia is enthusiastically mired. But behind the sordid fun, secrets and schemes are swirling. Unexpected dangers are growing and threatening to become deadly...
author: Cecelie Hart
